entries.meaning: A person who worries a great deal, especially unnecessarily.
examples: You are such a worrier! I'm sure everything will turn out all right.

entries.meaning: A person who causes worry in others.
An animal that seizes or shakes another by the throat.
examples: The person owning a dog which had destroyed sheep could be made to pay for the damage; but the Court should also have an undoubted power to order incurable sheep-worriers to be destroyed.
